phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
It is the first round of the second stage of the Royal Knights Selection Exam.
Sol's attack left Mimosa unable to move.
Asta was forced to face off with Magna, who came to attack their crystal on his own.
What do you think you are doing without me?
I am not going to be able to take both of them on!
The one who saved Asta was a mysterious mage named Xerx.
Attack the cherry blossom guy, you little shit!
I will take care of this in an instant!
And that instant's all I need!
With the help of Mimosa's plant spell that let us her control the enemy's movements,
Asta and the rest of B Team were able to claim victory.
And now, the destined battle between the brothers Finral and Langris is about to begin.
Special Little Brother vs. Failed Big Brother
You look like the failure that you are.
Who are you calling a failure?!
I am going to kill you!
I am so going to kill you!
As I thought, that guy is a very skilled flame magic caster.
The lightning guy is also one to look out for.
Luck is trying to cheer him up...
My, are not you a hungry little one?
What is going on over there?
I guess bulls will be bulls.
I am sure this next match
will be complicated for you, given who you are up against.
Not to mention, I have never beaten my little brother in anything.
I have fought alongside you, so I know.
I was able to face something hidden deep within my heart that I would been ignoring.
You are not going to lose so easily now.
Now get out there and show everyone how cool you are.
Do not lose like Magna, and come fight me.
I-I am rooting for you, too!
You would better not embarrass the rest of the squad.
I am so happy I joined the Black Bu
I want to see Marie as soon as possible, so win this in one second.
I am sure Captain Yami's cheering you on from the base, too.
He seemed a bit antsy this morning.
He said his stomach was acting up, but...
I am sure he just wants to see you work hard even without his help.
Those guys must be going beyond their limits and kicking ass right about now.
This one's going to be a killer.
I told you to restock the damn toilet paper!
As if you could actually defeat me, Brother.
Langris, I managed to change after meeting my friends.
We will be the ones who win this.
Do not blame me for whatever happens, all right?
Would you let me handle him?
I do not see why not.
I also want to fight my brother for real one day.
I am going to burn the image of me gallantly riding
my Shooting Star into everyone is eyes!
You will not lay a single finger on our crystal!
Finral, I know you can win this.
E Team: Leopold, Hamon, and Finral versus G Team: Langris, Fragil, and Sekke.
Round two of stage two, begin!
You two concentrate on destroying the enemy crystal.
Let us find out where it is.
I can see every inch of this battle stage as the light reflects off the glass.
It will take a little while, but I will definitely be able to find the enemy's crystal.
I expect you to take me all the way to the enemy base again, Mr. Bah-ha.
You can even call me Sek, bah-ha.
You brought shame upon the House of Vaude.
There is no way you can defeat me, Brother.
You see, you are not my child.
So the only one that I love is my dear little Langris.
Mother, it is a bit cruel to be so blunt.
What is that pathetically weak spell?
I see my dear little Langris is better than you at both academics and sports.
You are so amazing, my dear little Langris.
As I should expect from my own child.
He is older than me, but there is not one thing he can do better than me.
This is Lady Finnes, the fiancee of the next head of the House of Vaude.
Her chronic illness keeps her from going out often,
but the king is her great uncle, so she comes from a prestigious family
So basically, in the future, this woman and I will...
My dear little Langris, make sure you get along with her.
She is going to be your bride someday.
When I become the lord of this house,
I will be able to bring us fame like they have never seen.
I am very sorry that you got stuck with a fiancee who is sickly and older than you.
I am not the one who will become the next head of the House of Vaude.
My little brother is better at everything than me,
so he will be able to make you happy.
His magic is amazing, and he is a very decisive person.
There is not a single thing he can beat me i
I have only met you a few times, but I can tell.
You are a very kind person.
To me, you are a much more wonderful mage, Finral.
D-Do not tease me like that!
Oh, but I was not teasing you at all.
Who do you think you are, you dull woman?
You have the nerve to call me inferior to my brother?
That loser left the family because he could not handle the pressure.
He is not better than me at anything!
As we planned, we will leave him to you, Finral.
Do not blame me if you lose any limbs.
I will end this in a single blow!
I tested this out earlier with another spatial magic user, Cob, and found out...
the mana currents collide and cancel each other out!
Langris, we are the ones who are going to win!
You can cancel out spatial magic with spatial magic?
H-He is like a completely different person!
I get to have more yummy noms, la!
Hamon, where is the enemy team's crystal?
It is deep within that tower.
All right, I am counting on you two!
Who do you think you are, Brother?
I will remind you of your place!
This spell forces your senses to sleep.
You cannot attack me effectively any longer.
I am not tired at all...
Especially compared to my older sister's training, which could leave you dead!
Honestly, you still have much to learn.
You should give up and fall asleep, too.
I swore upon the symbol on my forehead...
that I would surpass my brother someday!
And that means I cannot lose in a place like this!
He enveloped himself in mana and canceled my spell.
I will not last much longer, Langris.
You do not see that every day!
Ah, so that is Finnes's fiance, Langris.
He is still no match for me, though.
It is only a matter of time before their crystal is destroyed!
I never thought you would become my natural enemy, Brother.
Do you plan on defending until our crystal breaks?
I am not sure that will be so easy!
I am going to use a new spell!
What in the world is that slow spell?
Like you could hit my badass self right now!
That is no match for my invincible Sekke Magnum Cannonball!
This is pretty pathetic, even for me.
I trained so hard, but I never could learn a single attack spell.
It is not an attack spell?
It follows the enemy, and once it makes contact,
it transports them to another location.
It is the applied version of the spell I usually use.
This way, he can get rid of enemies without hurting them!
He must be a kind soul.
Langris, it is only a matter of time before your crystal is destroyed.
I do not want to hurt you!
If you insist on continuing, I will have to use this spell to make you leave.
You constantly get on my nerves, Brother.
Who would have thought that our special reserve spells would be similar?
How dare you make me use my grimoire's magic?!
There is not a single thing you can beat me at, Brother!
I have felt this somewhere before!
This does not feel very pleasant.
I already know I do not stand a chance.
You may not like it, but we are similar.
Our mothers are different, but in the end...
I never did anything that made me seem like a big brother.
I left our family and tried to forget everything.
Langris, no matter what you think...
If you keep this up, I have a feeling you will not be you anymore!
What could you possibly know about me, Brother?
You are a coward who cannot even hurt people!
Do not you dare try to act like my big brother now!
There is nothing you can beat me at!
Young Master Finral is so friendly and kind, is not he?
He has a lot of friends, too.
Well, it is obvious that he looks down on people, you know?
To me, you are a much more wonderful mage, Finral.
Even I want someone that kind to...
Working too hard all the time hurts after a while, does not it?
Come goof off with your big brother once in a while!
There is a festival going on nearby!
Why is he nice to me, too?
My dear little Langris is so amazing.
I am better than you are.
That is why Mother and Father are kind to me.
I have to beat him at everything!
Just try and do something else.
How dare you do that to Finral?!
There is something wrong with you!
I mean, I know when I need to get tough.
It is the result of trying different things.
So is your new hairstyle also from trying different things?
I am sure you tried out a regent pompadour.
As well as Captain Yami's hairstyle.
If you do Marie's hairstyle, I will kill you.
I think this one is better.
I-It is just a better option, that is all.
How about something a bit more mature?
This is the hairstyle for when you go beyond your limits!
I wanted to see this hairstyle on you, Finral!
When it comes to me in this series, my hair should be the least of your worries!
Your daring and resolute king presents...
Next time on Black Clover, Page 81: The Life of a Certain Man.
Page 81 The Life of a Certain Man
